availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Squire Bunton (Mercer County, KY, boarding house keeper)

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, boarding house keeper. Kentucky native. Married to Nancy Keller Bunton in Mercer County, Kentucky, on May 22, 1819. Merchant in Mercer County in 1850. Boarding house keeper in Mercer County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, Harrodsburg, p. 369B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, Harrodsburg, p. 710.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Mercer County Marriages, Film 000191847, p. 308.
"Squire Bunton (1794-1877)," Find A Grave, Memorial 55586289, accessed November 11, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/55586289.
